thread.title: Man shot and killed near CenturyLink Field
thread.title_full: Man shot and killed near CenturyLink Field | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Man shot and killed near CenturyLink Field
text:
A man is dead after being shot multiple times near the stadiums in Seattle’s SODO neighborhood.
Witnesses reported hearing gunshots shortly after 4 a.m. Friday.
Police said they found the victim, a man in his 40s, lying in the street near Fourth Avenue South and South Royal Brougham Way.
He had multiple gunshot wounds. Witnesses said they saw two suspects leave on bikes.
Police closed streets in the area during the investigation. The northbound lanes of Fourth Avenue South are blocked. The southbound lanes reopened at about 6:30 a.m.
. @SeattlePD say victim is man in his 40s, multiple #gunshot wounds. Homicide detectives on scene. We are live again 5:30 on @KIRO7Seattle .
— Joanna Small (@JoannaKIRO7) October 9, 2015 Police are searching the area with K-9s.
"There's some other campers that sleep down the street and I think (police) are checking out the activity going on there because somebody could be hiding, crawl in somebody else's tent," said Dean Voller who was in the area.
Anyone with information about the shooting is asked to call the Seattle police homicide/assault tip line at 206-233-5000.
Get updates during our morning news on air through 7 a.m. and online through 8 a.m. Watch live: http://kiro.tv/LiveNews
